intrapreneur.translation[0].definitions[: someone who works for a large company and whose job is to develop new ideas or ways of doing business for that company
intrapreneur.translation[1].definitions[: someone who works for an organization, but outside the usual management structure, and who develops new products and activities. If successful, a new activity may be developed into an independent company
an intrapreneur within the bank who pioneered telephone selling of insurance
